name: Drag and Kill
description:
In this game you need to be good with your mouse, trying to catch the enemies in their way to kill you...

When you get one of them, you need to use it to kill other enemies...

Controls: Left mouse button - drag the enemies;

Left/Right/Up/Down - Menu Movement (in some cases will be left/right, and others will e up/down);

Enter - Confirm;

You find an old VHS tape and put it on your TV...

The tape loads and show up a screen with some kind of game...

How far can you get?
